          int y,
          int destX,
          int destY,
          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Create a new Indicator object
        Parameters:
        text - The damage to be displayed on the Indicator
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Indicator
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Indicator
        destX - The destination X co-ordinate of the Indicator
        destY - The destination Y co-ordinate of the Indicator
        color - The colour of the Indicator
